lead_paragraph: Mike McCoy refused to second-guess himself for not putting the ball in Melvin Gordon's hands on four snaps from the Denver 2 in one of the worst decisions in Week 8.

headline.print_headline: Not Handing Ball to Gordon Big Mistake for Chargers' McCoy
headline.main: Not Handing Ball to Gordon Big Mistake for Chargers' McCoy

snippet: Mike McCoy refused to second-guess himself for not putting the ball in Melvin Gordon's hands on four snaps from the Denver 2 in one of the worst decisions in Week 8....
